nodes.text: Derel Volk was an employee of the Mining Guild, and their usual representative to the annual Vor-cal Feast held at the House Melantha Orbital Hunting Lodge over Vycinyth due to his prowess as a hunter. Shortly before the Battle of Hoth,Volk was set to attend the Feast, but Annora Calandra arranged for him to be elsewhere so that she could attend the event in his stead.
